original_title: Fake doctor arrested for committing fraud
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police arrested a 56-year-old man from Borella for impersonating a doctor and committing financial fraud.

Sri Lanka Police said that the suspect had impersonated a doctor and positioned himself opposite the Lady Ridgeway Hospital for Children where he promoted himself as one who also send people overseas.
Police said the suspect from Pannala was arrested for defrauding people by promising them overseas opportunities.
Sri Lanka Police said that the suspect had earlier imporsonated a doctor at the Colombo National Hospital and defrauded a person of Rs. 70,000/- by promising to send him to Australia.
